sqlQuery.name: AssembliesByLibrary
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT da.source_id, ea.project_id as project_id, count(*) as library_count FROM apidb.EstAttributes ea, dots.Assembly da WHERE da.source_id = ea.assembly_source_id AND ea.library_id in ($$libraryId$$) AND ea.assembly_est_count >= $$min_ests_in_assembly$$ AND ea.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' GROUP BY da.source_id, ea.project_id HAVING count(*) >= $$min_lib_ests_in_assembly$$
